skills.label: Configure Word options
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: change default program, spell and grammar check options

skills.label: Apply protection to a document
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: restrict editing and apply controls or restrictions to document access

skills.label: Apply a template to a document
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: modify an existing template, create a new template, apply a template to an existing document, and manage templates by using the organizer

skills.label: Apply advanced font and paragraph attributes
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: use character attributes and character-specific styles

skills.label: Create tables and charts
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: insert tables by using microsoft excel data in tables, apply formulas or calculations on a table, modify chart data, save a chart as a template, and use the chart layout tab

skills.label: Construct reusable content in a document
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: create customized building blocks, save a selection as a quick part, save quick parts after a document is saved, insert text as a quick part, and add content to a header or footer

skills.label: Link sections
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: link text boxes, break links between text boxes, and link different sections

skills.label: Review, compare, and combine documents
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: apply tracking, merge different versions of a document, track changes in a combined document, and review comments in a combined document

skills.label: Create a reference page
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: add citations, manage sources, compile a bibliography, and apply cross references

skills.label: Create a Table of Authorities in a document
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: apply default formats, adjust alignment, apply a tab leader, modify styles, mark citations, and use passim (short form)

skills.label: Create an index in a document
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: specify index type, columns, and language
Modify an index
And mark index entries

skills.label: Execute mail merge
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: merge rules and send personalized email messages to multiple recipients

skills.label: Create a mail merge by using other data sources
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: use microsoft outlook, access, excel, or word tables as data source for a mail merge operation

skills.label: Create labels and forms
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: prepare data and create mailing labels, envelope forms, and label forms

skills.label: Apply and manipulate macros
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: record a macro, run a macro, and apply macro security

skills.label: Apply and manipulate macro options
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: run macros when a document is opened, run macros when a button is clicked, assign a macro to a command button, and create a custom macro button on the quick access toolbar

skills.label: Create forms
items: This objective may include but is not limited to: use the controls group, add help content to form fields, link a form to a database, and lock a form

skills.label: Manipulate forms
items: Unlock a form, add fields to a form, and remove fields from a form
